casebody.data:
Mike MAYERHOFFER v. UNITED STATES of America. No. 6126. Circuit Court of Appeals, Seventh Circuit. Feb. 26, 1937. II. C. Moore, of Springfield, 111., for appellant. Walter L. Rice, of Washington, D. C., for appellee.

Before EVANS, Circuit Judge, and BALTZELL and BRIGGLE, District Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Now this day come the parties by their counsel, and this cause now comes on to be heard on the printed record and briefs of counsel and on oral argument. On consideration whereof, it is now here ordered and adjudged by this court that the judgment of the District Court of the United States for the- Southern District of Illinois, Southern Division, in this cause, be and the same is hereby affirmed.
